'''Brea''' is a character in the [[Season 5|fifth]] season. She is played by [[Gemita Samarra]].<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3866826]</ref><ref>[http://instagram.com/p/vjcGUXmrB3/]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is a minor character by the name of Brea, a [[Braavos|Braavosi]] girl who [[Arya]] meets, along with her whole family.
